nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny. High near 95, with temperatures falling to around 90 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 109. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 78. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 93. Heat index values as high as 107. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Mostly clear, with a low around 77. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny, with a high near 94. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws_periods.name: Friday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 74. North wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.
